title: Pilot
episode_desc: Drunken father Frank is of no use to his dysfunctional family; Fiona meets a handsome stranger when her purse is stolen; Lip is shocked to discover his brother Ian is gay.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Frank the Plank
episode_desc: A manhunt ensues after Frank goes on a bender and turns up missing on Friday, the day he never fails to cash his disability check, and turns up in Toronto with no idea how he got there.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Aunt Ginger
episode_desc: Fiona turns her attentions to a cop, Tony, but Steve isn't willing to give up without a fight; Ian is targeted by the brothers of a girl he spurned; the family searches for the elderly aunt who owns their house.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Casey Casden
episode_desc: A sad and lonely Debbie steals a little boy from a birthday party, forcing the family to scheme a way to return him; a web of lies ends in a marriage proposal from Kevin, who is already married.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Three Boys
episode_desc: The family fakes a wedding when they learn Kevin's new fiancee comes with a substantial dowry; Frank deals with bad medical news by spiraling out of control; Steve looks for a new car, with Fiona along for the ride.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Killer Carl
episode_desc: Fiona tries to prove the Gallagher home is suitable for rehabilitating a delinquent; Lip gets busted taking the SAT for fellow students; Frank's poor business acumen continues to have negative consequences.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Frank Gallagher: Loving Husband, Devoted Father
episode_desc: Frank takes a risk when goons demand the six grand he owes them; Fiona agrees to a night away with Steve, leaving Liam in agoraphobic Sheila's care; Ian is fed up with Mickey's bullying of Kash.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: It's Time to Kill the Turtle
episode_desc: When Frank gives up drinking, Sheila worries he'll no longer be attracted to her, while Carl and Debbie enjoy having their dad back - despite Lip's warning that it won't last; Fiona barely notices that Steve's behaving suspiciously.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: But at Last Came a Knock
episode_desc: Frank needs his ex-wife's signature to claim some settlement money; Debbie learns that Steve may not be who he says he is; Monica shows up and announces she's taking baby Liam.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Nana Gallagher Had an Affair
episode_desc: Monica's return wreaks havoc on the Gallagher clan, while Frank hits a new low to stop a disability worker from tampering with his benefits.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Daddyz Girl
episode_desc: Fiona meets a new friend at Debbie's mothers group; Tony unravels the truth about Steve's car-stealing business; Frank loses his worker's compensation and tasks his kids with finding him a new and promisingly dangerous job.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Father Frank, Full of Grace
episode_desc: Steve tries to convince Fiona to skip town with him while she's trying to get Lip and Ian out of jail; Frank and Karen's secret is revealed, forcing Frank to go into hiding.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Summertime
episode_desc: Frank surrenders baby Liam collateral in a lost bet; Fiona thoroughly enjoys her youth as a bartender at a local hot spot; Sheila takes steps to finally leave the house; Debbie runs a daycare with Carl; Ian's business expands.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Summer Loving
episode_desc: Frank seeks new financial footing in fellow bar patron Dottie, whose declining health and city pension makes her attractive; Fiona juggles her job, kids and a burgeoning love life; Jasmine tries to help by setting her up with a sugar daddy.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: I'll Light a Candle for You Every Day
episode_desc: Fiona reconnects with her married high school crush, but wonders if her moral compass is leading her astray; Frank is willing to do just about anything to stay in Dottie's good graces, even marry her; Debbie becomes obsessed with death.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: A Beautiful Mess
episode_desc: Fiona deals with the consequences of sleeping with Craig when his angry wife shows up at the door; agoraphobic Sheila makes it all the way to the hair salon and Frank realizes his days in the Jackson household are numbered.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Father's Day
episode_desc: Frank tries to claim Eddie's insurance benefits and pension, despite being a prime suspect in his death; Fiona attends a ritzy wedding with Richard and lies about her background.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Can I Have a Mother
episode_desc: Grammy Gallagher shows up on medical furlough and tries to track down a former meth lab protege that owes her money; Fiona double dates with Steve and his Brazilian girlfriend; Frank discovers the identity of Eddie's insurance beneficiary.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: A Bottle of Jean Nate
episode_desc: Lip tries to get back in Karen's good graces by crafting a prenuptial agreement for her and Jody; Frank wants to kick Grammy out but Fiona resists until the basement meth lab explodes.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Parenthood
episode_desc: Fiona and Lip make a pact to earn their diplomas, but Lip acts out and is expelled after he realizes Karen plans to sell their baby; with Grammy near death, Frank leaves and walks in on Ian and Mickey locked in passion at the Kash and Grab.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Hurricane Monica
episode_desc: Monica returns to party with Frank, but nobody thinks she's back to stay; Fiona reconsiders kicking Lip out of the house; Frank is determined to claim every penny his mother left behind.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: A Great Cause
episode_desc: Fiona starts to plan for her future now that Monica has returned, but her reprieve may be short-lived; Steve conspires to reunite Estefania with her true love so he can be with Fiona; Lip and Ian learn the true identity of Mandy's baby.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Just Like the Pilgrims Intended
episode_desc: A traditional Gallagher family Thanksgiving includes a suicide attempt by Monica, Carl shooting a bald eagle, a case of willing identity theft, a money grab by Frank, and Karen going into labor.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Fiona Interrupted
episode_desc: Frank schemes to break Monica out of the facility, Jimmy earns his way back.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: El Gran Ca√±on
episode_desc: Now that they're living together, Fiona struggles to accept the new "boring" Jimmy. Frank wakes up in a place completely foreign to him. Lip is sentenced to community service. Baby Hymie keeps Jody and Sheila up all night.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: The American Dream
episode_desc: Fiona stresses about the money she used for her club night and it gets worse when Lip finds out. Frank makes his way home and he's the only one who can keep Hymie quiet. Kevin's wife resurfaces.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: May I Trim Your Hedges?
episode_desc: Frank tells Carl he has cancer so he can scam a charity foundation. Fiona is blown away by what she's asked to do to get a job as a cashier. Lip leads a crusade to hunt down pedophiles in the neighborhood.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: The Helpful Gallaghers
episode_desc: Carl says his goodbyes as he heads off to cancer camp. With Frank on babysitting duty, Sheila wants to introduce Jody to "toy time." Jimmy learns his parents are getting divorced and his dad is gay.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: The Sins of My Caretaker
episode_desc: The city of Chicago gives notice that they're doing work on the sewer main. The problem? Aunt Ginger's bones are still buried in the lawn and Frank needs to find her before the city does.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Cascading Failures
episode_desc: A government agency threatens the cohesion of the Gallagher clan. Meanwhile, Kev and Veronica recruit V's mother as a surrogate and Terry catches Mickey and Ian in a compromising situation.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: A Long Way from Home
episode_desc: Fiona makes a bold decision regarding her future with the kids. Debbie and Carl continue to deal with their foster homes. Frank prepares for his court appearance by getting sober. Timmy Wong and his mother arrive at Sheila's to take Hymie.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Where There's a Will
episode_desc: The family gathers for the real Aunt Ginger's fake funeral. Frank's cousin Patrick attends and the family conspires against him over Ginger's will. Kev and V continue trying for a baby.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Frank the Plumber
episode_desc: Fiona starts a new office job but has a hard time fitting in with the corporate culture. Frank inadvertently becomes involved in the gay rights movement where he meets Abraham Paige (Bradley Whitford).
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Civil Wrongs
episode_desc: While Fiona's job has brought structure into her life, things fall apart when Jimmy drops a bomb on her. Frank enjoys his newfound celebrity as the face of the gay rights movement.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Order Room Service
episode_desc: Fiona takes the kids on a camping trip. Essentially homeless, Frank seeks out Carl who sneaks him into the Gallagher van for the night.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Survival of the Fittest
episode_desc: Lip is graduating from high school, so Fiona and the family prepare a surprise party for him. Frank wins a bet and uses the winnings to take Lip out for lobster and some quality father/son time.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Simple Pleasures
episode_desc: As we catch up with the Gallagher clan, life at home is thrown into a state of upheaval with the reappearance of Frank. With Lip off at college and Ian still missing, Fiona attempts to connect with Debbie and Carl.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: My Oldest Daughter
episode_desc: Fiona begins to enjoy the perks of living life just above the poverty line, using her new health benefits to take the kids for checkups. Meanwhile, Lip seems to have lost his mojo as he struggles in school and with the ladies.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Like Father, Like Daughter
episode_desc: Frank stalks his previously unseen daughter, Sammi, and is surprised to find out she has a son, Chuck. Fiona and Mike get serious. Plus, Sheila has her first successful online date - with a Native American cowboy.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Strangers on a Train
episode_desc: Against her better judgment, Fiona continues her secret affair with Robbie. Frank attempts to contrive an "accident" that will provide an ample insurance payout to cover the cost of a potential liver transplant.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: There's the Rub
episode_desc: Fiona's bad decisions involving Robbie finally boil over. Frank and Sammi continue their pursuit of curing his liver trouble. Lip gets a surprise visit at college from Army investigators.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Iron City
episode_desc: The aftermath of Liam's accident lands Fiona in county jail - unsure of Liam's condition or her future. Meanwhile, after almost being killed by the sweat lodge, Frank gets some sobering news about his declining health.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: A Jailbird, Invalid, Martyr, Cutter, Retard, and Parasitic Twin
episode_desc: In the aftermath of Fiona's release from jail and Frank's illness guardianship of the Gallagher clan falls squarely on Lip - who gets some unexpected assistance from Amanda, his roommate's girlfriend.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Hope Springs Paternal
episode_desc: Fiona prepares for a visit from her probation officer and must rid the house of all suspicious items. Meanwhile, Ian gets kicked out of Mickey's house by a hammer-wielding Svetlana, and finally returns to the Gallaghers.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: The Legend of Bonnie and Carl
episode_desc: In detention, Carl shares a connection with a troubled girl named Bonnie. Fiona experiences the struggles of job-hunting with a criminal record, while Mickey ignores the birth of his son to spend time with Ian.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Liver, I Hardly Know Her
episode_desc: Fiona goes off the rails, violating multiple terms of her probation by partying with Robbie's degenerate friends. When the family doesn't hear from her, it sends them into search-party mode - not unlike their past experiences with Frank.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Emily
episode_desc: Fiona is hauled away to a correctional facility as Frank wakes up from his operation. Ian crashes Mickey's son's christening, Amanda's parents bribe Lip to stay away. Oh, and DCFS makes an unexpected visit.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Lazarus
episode_desc: Sheila fights for custody of the Native American kids and clashes with Sammi. Fiona gets sprung from jail and lands a job with the help of her parole officer. And Frank begins to feel like his old, troubled self.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Milk of the Gods
episode_desc: It's summertime again in Chicago. Fiona balances her job and a crush on her boss as Lip says goodbye to college and heads back home. Plus, Frank unveils the secret project he's been working on in Sheila's basement.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: I'm the Liver
episode_desc: Frank tries to talk Sheila out of an offer from two lesbians who want to buy her home. Plus, Kev bonds with Svetlana, Ian plots revenge against a homophobic military funeral protest, and Fiona is officially off house arrest.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: The Two Lisas
episode_desc: Frank enlists Carl to scare off the lesbians who are buying up the neighborhood. Meanwhile, Ian goes on a crazed cleaning spree of the Milkovich house, Fiona agrees to go to a concert with Davis, and Debbie throws a wild party.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: A Night to Remem... Wait, What?
episode_desc: In search of his insurance payout, Frank retraces the path of an epic bender. Meanwhile, Fiona and Gus head to city hall, Lip visits Amanda, Ian steals suitcases from the airport baggage claim, and Debbie crushes on a new boy.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Rite of Passage
episode_desc: Fiona's plans to announce her marriage unravel when a coworker OD's on heroin. Meanwhile, Mickey asks for Lip's help in dealing with Ian, Frank avoids Sammi, and Veronica sends Kevin out on a mission to get a handjob.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Crazy Love
episode_desc: Fiona is thrown into chaos by the return of Jimmy/Jack/Steve. Ian steals Mickey and Svetlana's baby and takes him on a road trip. Plus, a vengeful Sammi takes over the Gallagher house, and Veronica decides to separate from Kevin.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Tell Me You F**King Need Me
episode_desc: Ian finds himself under a mandatory hold at the psych ward. Meanwhile, Sammi takes drastic measures to teach Frank a lesson, Fiona makes a decision regarding Jimmy and Gus, and after V moves out, Svetlana moves in with Kev.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Uncle Carl
episode_desc: Fiona is confused when Gus announces he's leaving to go on tour. Meanwhile, when Carl is asked by his boss to run drugs, Frank sees a way to get revenge on Sammi, and Debbie is tasked with minding Ian's new bipolar meds.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Carl's First Sentencing
episode_desc: Frank plays tour guide for his terminally ill doctor, Bianca. Fiona preps Carl for his sentencing hearing. Plus, Lip sleeps with a professor, Ian realizes it's time to get back on meds and Kev finds himself the campus 'rapewalker.'
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: South Side Rules
episode_desc: Frank is having a ball with Bianca, his new sick friend and formerly uptight doctor. But when Bianca thinks Frank might be developing feelings for her she kicks him to the curb. Frank, however, returns to put up a fight.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Drugs Actually
episode_desc: Frank grows concerned as Bianca's behavior becomes increasingly more erratic and dangerous - but he'll do just about anything to show her a great time.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Love Songs (In the Key of Gallagher)
episode_desc: Fiona reunites with Gus after his tour but is torn by the fact that her friendly feelings for Sean have turned into love. Plus, Frank has his own love struggles as he works to keep Bianca happy - in Costa Rica.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: I Only Miss Her When I'm Breathing
episode_desc: Frank is still mourning the loss of Bianca while his newfound appreciation for life is freaking the Gallaghers out. Fiona is determined to get Ian to take his meds and to get Debbie to the clinic for a pregnancy test.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: #AbortionRules
episode_desc: Debbie carries a bag of flour around all day - determined to prove Fiona wrong about her ability to raise a child while going to school. She quickly realizes people are not as accommodating to mothers and babies as she hoped.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: The F Word
episode_desc: Frank teaches Debbie how to work the welfare system to her advantage. Kevin and Veronica visit a paralyzed Yanis in the hospital and try to make amends - only to have Yanis arrive home and try to kill the two Lisas with Kev's truck.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Going Once, Going Twice
episode_desc: Fiona confronts Patrick about the eviction notice, but her only choice is to get a mortgage from the bank and bid on the house at auction. Ian bakes cookies for the firehouse and discovers he was saved by the shift of gay firemen.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Refugees
episode_desc: Frank helps Erica through the cancer concierge process as Debbie ups her game with Tyler. Lip tries to protect Helene from the fallout of Amanda's disclosure.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: NSFW
episode_desc: Ian's relationship with Caleb gets more serious. Lip - still reeling from the very public scandal - is called to appear before a disciplinary committee where Helene accepts all the blame.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Pimp's Paradise
episode_desc: Carl struggles with Nick's absence, taking over the Gallagher home and remaking it as his "crib." Frank and Queenie rule the house - and Debbie returns when she's let go by Erica and Tyler.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Be a Good Boy. Come for Grandma
episode_desc: Fiona, now living with Sean, attempts to get his son, Will, to like her. He starts to come around, but when Will snags one of Carl's guns at the Gallagher house, Sean catches him and is furious with Fiona, worried he'll lose custody.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: A Yurt of One's Own
episode_desc: Fiona tries to make amends with Sean, who isn't giving her the time of day. Meanwhile, Debbie and Queenie travel to a rural commune along with Frank who is trying to escape G-Dogg - who's after him for stealing his drugs.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Paradise Lost
episode_desc: Sean officially moves into the Gallagher house as Fiona sets out to plan a traditional wedding. Meanwhile, Kev is not happy about V and Svetlana's pending green card marriage and tries to find a way around it.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Sleep No More
episode_desc: Frank offers to pay for the reception - then goes scamming around town to raise the money. Sean worries Frank only will end up hurting Fiona and confronts him on it. Their difference of opinion quickly descends into a brawl.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Familia Supra Gallegorious Omnia!
episode_desc: It's wedding day and Debbie shows up at the church with Franny. Ian finally brings Caleb to meet the family. Frank shows up uninvited - and high - and reveals that Sean is still a junkie.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Hiraeth
episode_desc: Frank wakes up after a month-long coma to find no one missed him. Debbie takes a criminal approach to making sure Franny grows up wealthy. Plus, Lip completes rehab and Carl, uncircumcised, looks into surgery.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Swipe, Fuck, Leave
episode_desc: Frank starts a new life barricaded on the top floor of the Gallagher home. Fiona starts running Patsy's Pies on her own terms. Plus, Debbie gets into stroller trouble; Ian tries out heterosexuality; and Carl's forced into abstinence.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Home Sweet Homeless Shelter
episode_desc: Kevin, Veronica and Svetlana start a topless maid service. Frank makes new friends at the shelter to replace his old family. Plus, Debbie's lifestyle comes to an end; Carl gets a gonorrhea scare; and business at Patsy's hits the skids.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: I Am A Storm
episode_desc: Frank worries that he and his new family will lose their Home for the Homeless shelter, so he plans a little goodwill for the neighborhood. Meanwhile, Fiona drums up business by throwing a speakeasy party at Patsy's Pies.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Own Your Sh*t
episode_desc: Frank learns that a billionaire philanthropist has bought the homeless shelter and he and his clan can stay. Meanwhile, Fiona gets smart financial advice from a Tinder hookup as Ian struggles with his feelings for Trevor.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: The Defenestration of Frank
episode_desc: Fiona sees opportunity in a laundromat for sale and decides to invest. Frank revels in the good fortune of his scam, but the troops catch a whiff of foul play. Meanwhile, Kev and V discover a shocking secret about Svetlana's father.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: You'll Never Ever Get a Chicken in Your Whole Entire Life
episode_desc: Fiona learns that owning a laundromat is costlier than expected. Frank helps Liam get into a plush new school after his old one is permanently shut down. Meanwhile, Debbie cleans up her act and grows closer to Neil.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: You Sold Me the Laundromat, Remember?
episode_desc: Fiona takes a DIY approach to renovating the laundromat. Lip agrees to go before the school board in hopes of getting reinstated. Meanwhile, Kev's trust in Svetlana wanes even further when the titty van goes missing.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Ouroboros
episode_desc: Monica is back. And her first task is to help Debbie get back Franny. Meanwhile, Frank tries to avoid her, Ian has his first fight with Trevor, Lip tries to mask his relapsing alcoholism and Fiona's laundromat gets a bad review.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Ride or Die
episode_desc: Fiona, facing mounting issues, contemplates Margo's offer to buy the laundromat. Meanwhile, Ian tries to deal with the fact that Mickey might be out of prison and Kev and V take matters into their own hands after Svetlana's betrayal.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Happily Ever After
episode_desc: Frank and Monica have an interesting proposal for the kids. Lip buckles under pressure from Debbie to get his sobriety under control. Meanwhile, Fiona sees a business opportunity as Kev and V attempt to start a new chapter.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Requiem for a Slut
episode_desc: The Gallaghers grapple with the loss of one of their own. As Lip takes steps to improve his future, Debbie, Carl and Liam get roped into Frank's new scheme. Meanwhile, Kev and V get their revenge on Svetlana.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: We Become What We... Frank!
episode_desc: The Gallaghers find themselves with money to burn as Carl sells their inheritance. Fiona focuses on her new apartment building; Lip deals with his sobriety; and Frank emerges out of a meth-induced haze to make amends.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Where's My Meth?
episode_desc: Frank joins the workforce for the first time. Meanwhile, Fiona grapples with evicting a tenant; Lip works out a plan to sabotage Charlie; Ian and Carl make a troubling discovery about Monica; and Kev prepares to go under the knife.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: God Bless Her Rotting Soul
episode_desc: A meth dealer threatens the Gallaghers, forcing Ian, Carl, Lip and Debbie to find a way to pay him off without involving Fiona. Meanwhile, Fiona battles a vindictive tenant; Lip cares for Professor Youens; and Frank attains sainthood.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: F**k Paying It Forward
episode_desc: A blast from the past shakes up Fiona's view of her life. Meanwhile, Frank gets involved with Liam's school PTA; Lip learns getting laid is harder than anticipated when sober; and Kev and V take a trip to meet his birth family.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: The (Mis)Education of Liam Fergus Beircheart Gallagher
episode_desc: As Fiona tries to raise the profile of the neighborhood, Ian helps Trevor to raise money for a new youth shelter. Meanwhile, Carl gets creative with securing his tuition and Frank teaches Liam's school all about the working class.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Icarus Fell. And Rusty Ate Him.
episode_desc: Fiona is forced to reflect on her own life after a lonely tenant dies. Meanwhile, Debbie has a pregnancy scare, Lip enlists Carl's help to search for his sponsor and Frank enjoys having his first-ever credit card.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Occupy Fiona
episode_desc: Ian tests Fiona's resolve by bringing an "Occupy Fiona" protest to her front door. Lip struggles to get Youens to court for his trial. Meanwhile, Frank goes on a job hunt and Carl gets a new client with a plan to get him his tuition.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Frank's Northern Shuttle Express
episode_desc: Frank starts a booming import-export business. Fiona considers moving into her own place. Meanwhile, Lip interviews new sponsors, Ian confronts an anti-gay pastor and Debbie deals with affording both school and raising Franny.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: The Fugees
episode_desc: Frank's business takes a turn, sending him on the run. Ian's run-in with a minister brings unexpected allies. Meanwhile, Fiona tries to fit in with Ford's friends and Lip must decide whether to tell Sierra about Charlie's past.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Church of Gay Jesus
episode_desc: Ian's sudden fame may be more than he can handle; Frank, however, finds a way to cash in. Meanwhile, Fiona struggles with her conscience over a worker who fell off her roof and Lip has a realization about his relationship with Youens.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: A Gallagher Pedicure
episode_desc: Fiona's homeless tenants barricade themselves in her apartment. Lip takes in a terrified Sierra and Lucas when her father is released from prison. Meanwhile, Ian provides sanctuary to a runaway teen and Frank considers his retirement.
show_desc: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

title: Sleepwalking
episode_desc: Fiona digs deep to get the homeless family out of her apartment. An explosive incident sends Ian into hiding. Meanwhile, Lip makes a difficult life decision as Frank schemes to take advantage of Liam's rich friend.

title: Are You There Shim? It's Me, Ian.
